PublicDescription: A directory write to the Level-1 D-Cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from the Level-2 cache
A directory write to the Level-1 I-Cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from the Level-2 cache
Level-1 Data TLB miss in progress. Incremented by one for every cycle a DTLB1 miss is in progress.
Level-1 Instruction TLB miss in progress. Incremented by one for every cycle a ITLB1 miss is in progress.
Incremented by one for every store sent to Level-2 cache
A directory write to the Level-1 D-Cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from an Off Book Level-3 cache

A directory write to the Level-1 I-Cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from an On Book Level-4 cache
A directory write to the Level-1 D-Cache where the line was originally in a Read-Only state in the cache but has been updated to be in the Exclusive state that allows stores to the cache line
A directory write to the Level-1 D-Cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from an Off Book Level-4 cache
A directory write to the Level-1 I-Cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from an Off Book Level-4 cache
A translation entry has been written to the Level-1 Data Translation Lookaside Buffer for a one-megabyte page
A directory write to the Level-1 D-Cache where the installed cache line was sourced from memory that is attached to the same book as the Data cache (Local Memory)
A directory write to the Level-1 I-Cache where the installed cache line was sourced from memory that is attached to the same book as the Instruction cache (Local Memory)
A directory write to the Level-1 I-Cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from an Off Book Level-3 cache

A translation entry has been written to the Level-1 Instruction Translation Lookaside Buffer
A translation entry has been written to the Level-2 TLB Page Table Entry arrays
A translation entry has been written to the Level-2 TLB Common Region Segment Table Entry arrays for a one-megabyte large page translation
A translation entry has been written to the Level-2 TLB Common Region Segment Table Entry arrays
A directory write to the Level-1 D-Cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from an On Chip Level-3 cache
